channel.title: Hardware on D0CUM3NTN4T10N
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on D0CUM3NTN4T10N

item.title: SAL Logic Analysis
item.description: Analysis linkSaleae’s Logic Analyzer is a tool for hardware analysis. Download Logic 2 and start it. chmod +x ./Logic-x.x.x-master.AppImage ./Logic-x.x.x-master.AppImage In the analyzer, click “Open a capture” and select the target file such as ".sal". Open “Analyzer” tab on the right of the windows and click on the “Async Serial”. The dialog opens, then configure some value e.g. Bit Rate. And click save button. After configuration, we can see the data analyzed in the Data section.

item.title: Gerber (GBR) Files
item.description: Gerber Viewer linkThere are many online tools to view GBR file. Online Gerber Viewer

item.title: NETGEAR Pentesting
item.description: Enumeration link nmap --script modbus-discover --script-args modbus-discover.aggressive=true -p 502 <target-ip> Default Credentials link admin:password
